sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"吸引，引诱"之意。
means: attract ：普通用词，指客观上吸引人的注意力。
charm ：侧重迷住某人或使之高兴。
enchant ：着重指有能力引起被迷住者的欢乐或赞美。
fascinate ：通常含使人无法拒绝、无法摆脱的意味。
tempt ：指吸引力很强，强调欲望被唤醒。

sentence.Network_en: He had unmistakably been waving his flag to attract the referee's attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 他显然一直在挥舞旗子吸引主裁判的注意。

sentence.Network_en: Russia's efforts to attract investment have been halting and confused.
sentence.Network_cn: 俄罗斯在吸引投资上一直踌躇不前，混乱不清。

sentence.Network_en: Airlines should stand or fall on their ability to attract passengers.
sentence.Network_cn: 航空公司的成败应该取决于它们吸引乘客的能力。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... attain 达到; 完成; 获得 attract 吸引 audio-visual 听觉视觉的.
释疑解难 - 新父母论语 - 金羊社区 ... ... Fish take best after rain. 雨后最易捕鱼。 take，n. attracting， 引起（兴趣，赞赏等）。.
大学英语四、六级单词、词组 - 豆丁网 ... attorney n. 律师 attract vt. 吸引；引诱 attraction n. 吸引；吸引力.
MPA英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... attorney n. 律师 attract v. 吸引,招引,引诱,引起(注意等) attraction n. 吸引,吸引力.

list.abs: (A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... attraction n. 吸引；吸引力；引力 attractive a. 有吸引力的 attribute vt. 把…归因于 n.属性.

酒店英语词汇_百度文库 ... attractive 有吸引力的 attractions 景点 attack 抨击,批评.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin attract- 'drawn near', from the verb attrahere, from ad- 'to' + trahere 'draw'

entry.def: If something attracts people or animals, it has features that cause them to come to it.

example.ex: The Cardiff Bay project is attracting many visitors...
example.tran: 加的夫海湾项目吸引了众多游客。

example.ex: Warm weather has attracted the flat fish close to shore...
example.tran: 煦暖的气候将比目鱼引到了近海。

entry.tran: 引起…的注意（或兴趣、赞赏等）；诱惑
entry.def: If someone or something attracts you, they have particular qualities which cause you to like or admire them. If a particular quality attracts you to a person or thing, it is the reason why you like them.

example.ex: He wasn't sure he'd got it right, although the theory attracted him by its logic...
example.tran: 该理论的逻辑性吸引了他，但他不能确定自己的理解是否正确。

example.ex: What first attracted me to her was her incredible experience of life...
example.tran: 她离奇的人生经历最先吸引了我。

entry.def: If you are attracted to someone, you are interested in them sexually.

example.ex: In spite of her hostility, she was attracted to him...
example.tran: 尽管自己心存敌意，她还是为他所吸引。

example.ex: I was married to a man who had ceased to attract me.
example.tran: 我嫁给了一个我已不再钟情的男人。

entry.tran: 吸引，招引（支持、关注或金钱）
entry.def: If something attracts support, publicity, or money, it receives support, publicity, or money.

example.ex: President Mwinyi said his country would also like to attract investment from private companies...
example.tran: 姆维尼总统说他的国家同样愿意吸收来自私营公司的投资。

example.ex: Opinion polls suggest that the two rebels have attracted a lot of sympathy.
example.tran: 民意测验显示两名反对者获得了大量支持。

entry.def: If one object attracts another object, it causes the second object to move towards it.

example.ex: Anything with strong gravity attracts other things to it.
example.tran: 任何有较强重力的物体都会对其他物体产生引力。

means.word_mean: 1. direct toward itself or oneself by means of some psychological power or physical attributes;

sentences.sentence: "Her good looks attract the stares of many men"
"The ad pulled in many potential customers"
"The store owner was happy that the ad drew in many new customers"

means.word_mean: 2. exert a force on (a body) causing it to approach or prevent it from moving away;

sentences.sentence: "the gravitational pull of a planet attracts other bodies"
"The idea of a vacation appeals to me"

auth_sentence.content: They may require too much pruning or attract bugs.
auth_sentence.res_content: They may require too much pruning or attract bugs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They may require too much pruning or attract bugs.

auth_sentence.content: Treasury's main goal is to attract private capital.
auth_sentence.res_content: Treasury's main goal is to attract private capital.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Treasury's main goal is to attract private capital.

auth_sentence.content: The idea is that these will attract people in.
auth_sentence.res_content: The idea is that these will attract people in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The idea is that these will attract people in.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 心烦意乱的,精神不集中
stems_affixes.word_buile: distract[v.分心]+ed……的→adj.心烦意乱的,精神不集中
abs离开+tract拉→被拉开→心不在焉

stems_affixes.value_cn: 吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: attract[v.吸引]+ive……的→adj.吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
tract拉,拖,抽+or物器→拉的东西→拖拉机
attract[v.吸引]+ion表名词→n.吸引;吸引力;引力
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小
at加强动作+tract拉→拉过来→吸引
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小

Sentence.sentence: The radio business has changed greatly and now attracts more listeners.
The importance of non-financial firms will accordingly rise, along with their ability to attract the best talent.
To attract the attention from the media.
Migrants to cities are attracted by plentiful jobs, access to hospitals and education, and the ability to escape the boredom of a farmer's agricultural life.

His main thesis is that the buzz of urban life, and the opportunities it offers for co-operation and collaboration, is what attracts people to the city, which in turn makes cities into the engines of art, commerce, science and progress.
Attract people to America's national parks.

means.word_mean: 吸引, 引起…的注意；使喜爱；引起…的好感（或爱慕）

sentences.cn: 那只熊猫吸引了不少孩子。

means.word_mean: 具有吸引力，招引，引人注目

sentences.en: Her flirtatious manners are intended to attract.
sentences.cn: 她的轻浮举止是想引人注意。

jushi.english: Her flirtatious manners are intended to attract.
jushi.chinese: 她的轻浮举止是想引人注意。

jushi.english: Like charges repel each other, unlike charges attract.
jushi.chinese: 同性电荷相斥,异性电荷相吸。

jushi.english: It is a property of matter to attract.
